content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5) with coal (refueled with 50 coal in steps 33, 43, and 51)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipe groups for water flow:
  - PipeGroup with water at positions [(-8.5,-0.5),(-7.5,-0.5),(-6.5,0.5),(-7.5,0.5),(-5.5,0.5)]
- Steam pipe system at positions [(-3.5,3.5),(-3.5,2.5),(-2.5,5.5),(-3.5,5.5),(-3.5,4.5),(-2.5,6.5)]
- Currently producing approximately 35-36 water and 35-36 steam per minute

### Iron Production Line at (17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (17.5, 72.5)
- Transport belt system:
  - Belt at position (17.5, 74.5)
  - Belt at position (17.5, 75.5)
  - Belt at position (18.5, 75.5)
  - Belt at position (19.5, 75.5)
- Input inserter at position (18.5, 74.5)
- Wooden chest for iron ore at position (18.5, 76.5)
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 80.0) with 50 coal
- Multiple inserters for item movement:
  - Inserter at position (18.5, 77.5) to move from chest to another chest
  - Inserter at position (19.5, 77.5) to move items from belt to furnace
  - Inserter at position (19.5, 78.5) to move items between positions
  - Inserter at position (18.5, 80.5) to feed iron ore to furnace
  - Inserter at position (21.5, 80.5) to take iron plates from furnace to chest
- Additional wooden chests:
  - Chest at position (18.5, 78.5)
  - Chest at position (22.5, 80.5) for collecting iron plates
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles at various positions

### Copper Production Line at (-47.5, 75.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (-47.5, 75.5)
- Transport belt system:
  - Belt at position (-47.5, 77.5)
  - Belt at position (-46.5, 77.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-48.0, 79.0) with 50 coal
- Multiple inserters for item movement:
  - Inserter at position (-46.5, 78.5) to move copper ore from belt
  - Inserter at position (-46.5, 79.5) to move items from furnace
  - Inserter at position (-47.5, 80.5) to feed copper furnace
  - Inserter at position (-46.5, 80.5) (multiple directions) for item transport
  - Inserter at position (-45.5, 81.5) for further transport
- Wooden chests:
  - Chest at position (-46.5, 81.5) containing 200 copper ore
  - Chest at position (-45.5, 80.5)
- Transport belt at position (-44.5, 81.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

### Copper Cable Assembly Line at (25.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (25.5, 80.5) with copper cable recipe
- Input inserter at position (23.5, 80.5)
- Output inserter at position (27.5, 80.5)
- Wooden chest for copper cables at position (28.5, 80.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

### Electronic Circuit
